headline: Ask HN: PayPal ruled against me claiming the opposite of the evidence
description:
Hi.

I apologize in advance, but it looks like it's my turn for social media big tech support.

I had a situation where OVH abused a PayPal authorization to charge me 1200€ for a "private cloud" credit I never asked. OVH refuses to refund me changing the reason for it every time, but well, that's another topic.

I filed a PayPal dispute, I added exchanges with OVH as evidence, where the constantly insist on me having this "credit" still available for me to use, and my insisting on not wanting it for any purpose (the 12€ I added were enough for my test) and not having ordered it.

Finally, PayPal ruled in favor of OVH claiming that I "never provided documentation to prove this credit".

Not only I did (OVH messages), but nobody asked me for evidence at any point: I could have provided extra information/screenshots where it is shown. I am positive OVH was requested multiple times for documentation to support their claims, but that was never the case for me, not sure if that's normal.

Now I'm stuck with an absurd amount of credit on a cloud service I have no use for, and apparently there's no UI option for me to contest this PayPal ruling.

Other than hitting a lawyer and contact consumer protection organisations, what else is there to do? Anyone at PayPal can give me a hint?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 贝宝对我的裁决声称与证据相反
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 貝寶對我的裁決聲稱與證據相反
description_zh-Hans:
我提前道歉，但看起来轮到我的社会媒体大技术支持了。

我有一个情况，OVH滥用PayPal的授权，向我收取1200欧元的"私有云"信用，我从来没有要求。

我提出了一个PayPal争议，我增加了与OVH的交流作为证据，他们不断坚持我有这个"信用"仍然可以让我使用，而我坚持不想要它用于任何目的（我添加的12欧元足够我的测试），并且没有订购它。

最后，PayPal作出了有利于OVH的裁决，声称我"从未提供文件来证明这个信用"。

不仅我提供了（OVH的信息），而且没有人在任何时候要求我提供证据：我可以提供额外的信息/屏幕截图，其中显示了它。我肯定OVH被多次要求提供文件以支持他们的主张，但对我来说从来没有这种情况，不知道这是否正常。

现在我被困在一个我没有用的云服务上的荒谬数额的信贷，显然没有UI选项让我对PayPal的裁决提出异议。有谁能在PayPal给我一个提示？
